attributes.action: Acctualy take notice of all petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i am fed up with there being an overwhelming amount of people signing all these very astute & important petitions only to see they are ignored by the sheer arrogance and small minded pig ignorance that seems to have instilled itself in todays government. May i remind you, you work for us and must do what we wish, it is not the other way around. You may be head of the government but that does not give you the right to run this country like a military state. TAKE NOTICE OF THE PETITIONS AND DO SOMETHING CONSTRUCTIVE
STOP WASTING OUR MONEY
NOW.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
